name: SCP Heartbeat (DEMO)
description:
SCP Heartbeat is  a work-in-progress Dating Simulator situated in the SCP Universe!

You play as someone with no prior connection or knowledge to the Foundation's existance, suddenly waking up inside an absolutely empty Site-17. It seems most, if not all Foundation personel have just... disappeared. Although no conatinment breach has occured.

With no other options, you team up with the remaining SCPs present in the facility to try and figure out what's going. The mysteries never end: people vanishing from day to night? The origins of your character? SCPs selectively losing their anomalies?

Well, just watch out. Walking around with you so much, they might just get TOO attatched.
